column5: Launched the tinner last night for the 1st time on the Grand in hunt of some big cats ...well that didn't happen but i gave it a good shot from 5 till 11pm ...must have had 50 good hits and 49 good misses found the fish were being very picky for me..they would  pick up the bait and drop it just as fast .also kicked 2 mice outa the boat tonight not sure how  they were getting in the boat they must have been climbing my rope from shore sniffing out my stink bait.not noing  were they came from but they were not welcome lol......back at it again tonight if the rain holds off ...Fishmaster

Haha!  That title is a tad misleading...  The younger generation woulda thought you had gone kuna hunting, while the older gents may have thought you had been out after some puma!!  gnaawwww  Good stuff though!  I'm sure she was tasty...  cheers  HD

nice night out tho, eh?!  we had the same luck the other night... i've got about a 11% hook up rate with 1/0 circle hooks, suddenly i don't feel so bad... but i know you'll pick it up like you do every year and show me just how awful i am lol
WHAT??? you did NOT use them as bait? what a waste!    lol

Never thought of trying that  Mouse and Cats  might be a good combo ...as for 1/0 circle hooks way to small i use 4/0 and 5/0 big cat circle hooks ...you might wana try bigger hooks just a thought ...
i assume you carry them Steve? can't find them around here, 1/0 is the biggest i can get.... i know i need bigger ones, just can't find them is all... might come by one day and grab a pack or 2!!
Should have more in tommrow ..and yes they are hard to find the 4/0 & 5/0 but you will find your 11% will climb to 80%
